name: Baby Cooking Assistant - Help Mom to Make breakfast
name_original: Baby Cooking Assistant - Help Mom to Make breakfast
description: Baby Lulu wants to help her mother in the kitchen so today she is going to join her and cook breakfast. First they both have to go shopping and fill their cart with all the ingredients they need. Then they will cut vegetables and do a salad using lettuce, tomatoes, carrots and salt. Then they will heat some oil and cook some eggs in it, doing sunny sides up. Finally they will create a burger stacking buns, lettuce, cheese, onions, meat and ketchup. This is a very healthy and nutritious breakfast and Baby Lulu will surely learn a lot for when she grows up. Of course, she will not use the knife and fire herself, she will just hand the items to her mother, assisting her and watching carefully. Have a wonderful time playing this game
